snippet.title: Sunstone War - Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam link : https://store.steampowered.com/app/2535560/Sunstone_War/

Imagine a Tower Defense where you could hold and toss away ✨EVERYTHING✨

From your towers to obstacles and even your enemies!

🏰 Move towers strategically
🌳 Throw obstacles to slow enemies down!
👿 Toss away foes to maximize damages!

A game by @Blukulélé  https://twitter.com/Blukulele
And @CyrolisDev https://twitter.com/CyrolisDev
